survey_properties.intro_message:
Please Go through the questions and answer carefully


Each question will be having multiple choices with single answers or multiple answers

Questions are based on the domain of tender you just chose

It will take less than 2 minutes to answer everything
survey_properties.end_message: Thank you! Your bid has been submitted

questions.question_title: What type of steel would you use for the construction of this bridge?
Which grade cement would you use?
Q3. What is the minimum weight load limit for the bridge for a single axle?

What is the minimum time frame required for this project completion as per your thought?
(Eg: 1y or 6m or 2y8m)

Provide us with an estimate amount required for the work completion
(Eg: 123456)
